src:
LOAD s1, 1

s: INPUT s0, 0
CALL asciiLU
OUTPUT sA, 0
JUMP s

asciiLU:
LOAD sA, 0
COMPARE s0, 0d90
RETURN NC
CALL@ (s1, s0)
RETURN


ADDRESS 100
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0d27 ; Escape
LOAD&RETURN sA, '1'
LOAD&RETURN sA, '2'
LOAD&RETURN sA, '3'
LOAD&RETURN sA, '4'
LOAD&RETURN sA, '5'
LOAD&RETURN sA, '6'
LOAD&RETURN sA, '7'
LOAD&RETURN sA, '8'
LOAD&RETURN sA, '9'
LOAD&RETURN sA, '0'
LOAD&RETURN sA, '-'
LOAD&RETURN sA, '='
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0
LOAD&RETURN sA, 9 ; Tab
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'q'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'w'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'e'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'r'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 't'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'y'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'u'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'i'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'o'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'p'
LOAD&RETURN sA, '['
LOAD&RETURN sA, ']'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 10 ; Enter
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0  ; Control
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'a'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 's'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'd'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'f'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'g'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'h'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'j'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'k'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'l'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0d59
LOAD&RETURN sA, "'"
LOAD&RETURN sA, '`'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; LShift
LOAD&RETURN sA, "\"
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'z'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'x'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'c'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'v'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'b'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'n'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 'm'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0d44
LOAD&RETURN sA, '.'
LOAD&RETURN sA, '/'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0
LOAD&RETURN sA, '*'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; Alt 
LOAD&RETURN sA, ' '
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; Caps lock
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; F1
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; F2   
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; F3
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; F4
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; F5
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; F6
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; F7
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; F8
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; F9 
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; F10
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; Num lock
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; Scroll Lock
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; Home key
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; Up Arrow
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; Page Up
LOAD&RETURN sA, '-'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; Left Arrow
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ;
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; Right Arrow
LOAD&RETURN sA, '+'
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ;  End key
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ;  Down Arrow
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ;  Page Down
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ;  Insert Key
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ;  Delete Key
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; F11 Key
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ; F12 Key
LOAD&RETURN sA, 0 ;
